mapper.insert: insert into t_worker(worker_id, worker_pw, worker_name, worker_license, worker_organization, worker_tel, worker_phone, worker_area) values(#{worker_id}, #{worker_pw}, #{worker_name}, #{worker_license}, #{worker_organization}, #{worker_tel}, #{worker_phone}, #{worker_area})
mapper.select: select * from t_worker where worker_id=#{worker_id} and worker_pw=#{worker_pw}
